text: 14:29 Hibru 3:17Ia arɨghireghtɨ, ian kuaba tintinimɨn gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganir kam gireghɨv ikiam. Ia puvɨra na gimobi, kamagh amizɨ, gumazir 20plan azeniba itiba, ko 20 plan azenibagh afiraziba, kar gumazir me faragha men ziaba osirigha gɨvaziba, me bar nguazir aghuir kamɨn aven mangan kogham.
